definition: to follow closely behind sb or sth (idiom)
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: One car made a sudden stop and the car behind it pilled up.
sentences.chinese: 由于前面的车急停车，紧随其后的车撞了上去。

sentences.english: A hatchback and a SUV will quickly follow.
sentences.chinese: 紧随其后，一款两厢车和SUV车型将面市。

sentences.english: her mother died and her father followed.
sentences.chinese: 母亲辞世后不久，父亲也紧随其后，悄然离去。

sentences.english: The littlest knight followed on his pony.
sentences.chinese: 小小骑士乘着马驹紧随其后。

sentences.english: Czech Republic is second on 10 points, with Scotland on eight.
sentences.chinese: 捷克累积10分紧随其后，而苏格兰则排名第八。

sentences.english: He set out with the long fishing pole on his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他扛上鱼杆出发了，两只狗紧随其后。

sentences.english: SunTrust (STI, Fortune 500) , a large regional bank, has also followed suit.
sentences.chinese: 太阳信托，一个大型的地方银行，也紧随其后。

sentences.english: Russia, in 11th place, Korea and India are chasing closely behind.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯排在第11位，韩国和印度紧随其后。

sentences.english: France and Japan lined behind with 47 and 41 each.
sentences.chinese: 法国和日本以47个和41个品牌紧随其后。

sentences.english: The man put on overcoats, shut the door and go out, she follow him tightly.
sentences.chinese: 男人穿起外套，甩门而出，她紧随其后。

sentences.english: There are six Decepticon fighters howling after it.
sentences.chinese: 六个狂派战士呼啸着紧随其后。

sentences.english: Italians are considered the most stylish with the French right on their heels.
sentences.chinese: 意大利人被认为是最为时尚的游客，法国人紧随其后。

sentences.english: Planning is under way to minimise delays in burials and cremations.
sentences.chinese: 减少丧葬和火化延迟方面的计划将紧随其后。

sentences.english: The Augsburg site will follow suit shortly afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 其奥格斯堡工厂不久之后也将紧随其后。

sentences.english: The prisoner trails behind, his head bowed, bootlaces skipping along the ground.
sentences.chinese: 囚犯紧随其后，头低垂，松散的鞋带一路蹦跶着。

sentences.english: Extending the maturity of bonds is the next step.
sentences.chinese: 延长债券有效期是紧随其后的下一步。

definition: to divide into rows/to identify subcategories/to break down into constituent parts/breakdown/disaggregation
leading/in first place/top of the list
to take the lead in a race/to set the pace
second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
to stand side by side/to be juxtaposed
